name: Pussycat Pirates
description:
A turn based local multiplayer dice rolling game about cat pirates trying to sink eachothers ship. 

All controls are buttons on screen and how to play is in the menu

I ran out of time to programme an ai to play with you however even if you have no one to play with give playing against yourself a go since everything is randomised through a dice roll

Also while playing the prep phase remember the dice is completely random so it might take awhile to put everything together but please give it a chance

Things to remember even after reading thehow to play section:

Crew Stat = Attack Power and Ship Stat = Health

Canon attacks role fo accuracy and Crew attacks role for casualties
